prompts: Create a bipedal Fighting-type Pokemon with a red and white color scheme.
Imagine a martial arts-themed Pokemon that excels in hand-to-hand combat, showcasing strength.
Generate a Pokemon design inspired by traditional karate, featuring red accents and a fierce expression.
Show me a unique Fighting-type Pokemon with a strong stance and a white gi.
Make a red and white Pokemon that embodies the spirit of martial arts and discipline.
Design a Pokemon that combines the agility of a fighter and the bulk of a powerhouse.
Give me a Fighting-type Pokemon that is both intimidating and disciplined, with a strong martial arts theme.
